episodes.title: Episode 011 - The Water Canopy (Ghost Teachings)
episodes.description: Did you know that the JW religion has several "Ghost Teachings?" These are doctrines that they used to teach and believe in the past but have since discarded without officially retracting them. One such teaching is that of the "Water Canopy", which they once believed was the source of the flood waters, which deluged the earth in Noah's day. Please listen to find out more. episodes.title: Episode 002 - Building A Successful After Leaving The JWs
episodes.description: If you've been a Jehovah's Witness you'll know that the religion's leaders have historically encouraged members to devote as much time as possible to their evangelising work, leaving little time for secular pursuits like, higher education and building a successful career. This can make it difficult to find rewarding work after leaving the "religion". That's what I'll be speaking about in this episode along with Stephen Mather, an ExJW who's built a successful career as a corporate trainer and organisational psychologist.
